intro: Good evening, we are from Ukraine! In this difficult time it is extremely important to unite for a common goal - OUR VICTORY !!! Each of us tries to be useful to the Motherland and do everything in our power, and my friends and I are no exception. We organized a charity fund, which includes a group of volunteers who already had experience in purchasing and transporting cars for the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
explanation: In order to maintain the high-quality combat capability of the units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine during active hostilities, there is a need for rapid transportation of ammunition, food, as well as transportation of personnel. Since the active phase of the war is currently underway, there is a catastrophic lack of transport for the above purposes, so there is a need for conventional reliable cars with high off-road capability. Given the low cost of special military transport, you can buy more cars and provide them with more combat units.
aim: What do we offer? The main goal of the fund is to deliver the car to units that are in dire need of transport. Therefore, having talked to the military, we have contacts of people who are responsible for the units where these machines are needed.
help: How can you help us? If you have the opportunity - you can make your contributions. We would also be grateful for information about our foundation.
mention: Click on the wallet number to copy.
copied: Text was copied to the clipboard
posts.0.body: Good evening! Our team has already selected several cars for the needs of our soldiers! We want to show you what cars we are going to buy and bring for our defenders.All details will be posted on a pinned post to our group. Glory to Ukraine!
posts.1.body: I was giving an interview today :
posts.2.body: Hello everybody!!!We haven't been in touch with you for three long weeks. During this time, we have had have a lot of difficulties and bureaucratic issues in finding cars for our army. But we succeeded! Thanks to the help of caring people, we now have a well-established mechanism for transporting transport from Europe.Without wasting time, a representative of our foundation went to the base of cars in Europe, and this week for personal and funds raised by the fund bought 2 cars. These cars will arrive in Ukraine next week and will come to the aid of the Armed Forces.You can also help us.
posts.3.body: Cars for our guys are already coming to us. In a few days we will be able to pass them on to our defenders. Glory to Ukraine!
posts.4.body: Finally we took the cars for our defenders. And immediately started to paint the cars on the outside to give them a more combative look. Together with all the work, it took about a day.
posts.5.body: This is the result of our hard work! The cars have been repainted in camouflage and will soon be transferred to the front line.Thank you to everyone who helped raise money for cars for our soldiers !!!If you also want to help us, account numbers locate on the website.
posts.6.body: Hello!We have already delivered the cars to the base for further transfer to our soldiers. The report on the transfer of cars will be published later on our website.Thank you to everyone who participated in the fundraiser!Subscribe, distribute, we will help the Armed Forces!Glory to Ukraine!
posts.7.body: Well, finally our soldiers have a free moment to send us their 'Hello' from the front. Our vehicles are already in key positions and have been helping our fighters defend our country and our interests from Russian invaders for several weeks. I hope that the car will be able to serve our soldiers for a very long time and with benefit. You can also help us raise money for such cars, any amount will help us a lot! Glory to Ukraine!!! Glory to the armed forces!
posts.9.body: Friends, now we want to share with you what we have already done for this period: We received a request to purchase two cars for the boys from the 126th battalion. It came to us already while we were on our way to the cars for the military unit A4790üá∫üá¶ It was very unexpected for us to collect the following amount in such a quick time: ‚Ç¨14,000 in 2 days!!!! We have already finished the previous business trip: we brought 2 cars, painted them and managed to hand them over to the military. We don't waste time, every minute is very important now. Today we are leaving again! The goal is to bring 2 cars for the 126th battalion, for which you and I so quickly collected funds all together. In addition, originally we were supposed to provide 1 car, but you are so incredible and selfless that we will be able to bring 2 cars!!! Our team is infinitely grateful to everyone for your care and help, but ahead we plan to continue to help our defenders, so we are already planning a new collection. Everything will be UKRAINE
posts.10.body: The process of painting cars for soldiers : üí™üèªüá∫üá¶
posts.11.body: Our fighters received two cars and convey to you their great gratitude for the participation of each of you! We are very proud of you!!!
posts.12.body: Finally, we can show you the result of our joint effortsüá∫üá¶.Together with you, we took pennies and brought more cars for the Viysk people. Once again I want to thank the skin for reposts, for your donations ...Without your help, nothing happened to us. You give us the strength to continue the work of the name all at once and do not stumble upon what has been reached!Glory to ZSU!!!! Glory to Ukraine!!!!!!!!!
posts.13.body: And the axis and photo of another wheelbarrow for our lads. Fed up and already ready to go to the b—ñy!!!!
posts.14.body: These cars will get a bullet.Perhaps they will be shot at from a tank.Or maybe they will blow up on mines.They will travel 50 kilometers,or maybe several thousand. But they will definitely be blown up, they will definitely be left without wheels, or simply break, after completing their task.But we accomplished our task. We tested it, repaired it, painted it and gave it to our boys. Perhaps we will see videos of them storming enemy positions or evacuating the wounded. And maybe we won't see it...But one way or another, this miracle wouldn't have happened if it weren't for you, if it weren't for your reposts and donations. We thank everyone who participated and love you with all our hearts. You can throw a hryvnia at the next thief, who will surely be destroyed, but she is very necessary, here:
posts.15.body: And this is what the process of painting a wheelbarrow looks like, which helps destroy russian orcs on the front üá∫üá¶üá∫üá¶üá∫üá¶üá∫üá¶
posts.16.body: The guys convey their gratitude from the frontline!!!!! Glory to the Armed Forces!
posts.17.body: Friends, thanks to you, we have already donated one of the two cars for our boys. Thank you to everyone for your reposts and donations, you are incredible!!! But the collection is not yet closed, we continue to collect for the second car and are grateful to each of you for your help! The boys protect us and we must do everything to protect them, everyone's help is needed!!! Glory to Ukraine!!! Glory to the Ukrainian Armed Forces!!!
posts.18.body: And this is how we painted this baby, which is already helping our soldiers to destroy Russia. Everything will be Ukraine!!!!
posts.19.body: Thank you to everyone who joined the collection!!!! Without your help, we wouldn't be able to do anything... The car has been purchased, painted and already handed over to the guys! In a few days, the car will help to carry out combat tasks at the front... But we do not stop there and continue to help bring OUR VICTORY closer!!! GLORY to the Armed Forces!!! GLORY TO UKRAINE!!!
posts.20.body: The process of painting the car üí™üí™üí™
current-aim: Well, we were not able to complete the collection for the car to Kharkiv, on which the guys have been successfully bringing us closer to victory for several weeks. But we don't have time to wait anymore, because there are still people who need our help... The guys turned to us 120 brigades from the 173rd battalion were sent to hell in the Donetsk region on the front line... Since the first line of defense is under constant fire from tanks, mortars, artillery and MLRS, the guys need reliable and high-speed equipment. You and I have already done incredible things and helped many , but we need a little more miracle, in order to try to save the lives of the people who protect us... We need to raise 10,000‚Ç¨ to buy two cars for the boys. I am sure that you and I will be able to do it, because the Ukrainians of each of the day prove to the whole world that there is nothing incredible!!! All links are in the header of the profile on our website. Glory to the Armed Forces!!!! Glory to Ukraine!!!!!!! The guys sent us a photo to show what was left of their cars...
